title: Implement Epic status validation logic
description: Create logic to automatically manage Epic status based on child tasks/epics. Epic can only be marked 'done' if ALL child tasks and epics are 'done'. Implement validation and auto-status updates.

comments.text: STATUS VALIDATION LOGIC: 1) Epic can only transition to 'done' if ALL child tasks have status='done' AND ALL child epics have status='done' 2) When child item status changes, check if parent epic can be auto-completed 3) Prevent manual status changes that violate rules
